title: Enhanced Ink UI: alive indicator, CodeRabbit status, error detection
description:
## Implementation Approach

### Status File Protocol
ralph.zsh writes status to /tmp/ralph-status-$$.json:
```json
{"state": "running|cr_review|error|retry", "lastActivity": 1234567890, "error": null, "retryIn": 0}
```

### Component Structure
1. **AliveIndicator.tsx** - Spinner + 'last activity Xs ago' from lastActivity timestamp
2. **CodeRabbitStatus.tsx** - Shows when state='cr_review'
3. **ErrorBanner.tsx** - Red banner when state='error'
4. **RetryCountdown.tsx** - Shows 'Retrying in Xs' when state='retry'
5. **HangingWarning.tsx** - Yellow warning if >60s no activity

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update lastActivity timestamp on Claude output received
Set state='cr_review' before cr review call, state='running' after
Set state='error' with error message when error detected
Set state='retry' with retryIn seconds during cooldown
Clean up status file in cleanup_ralph() trap
Create components/AliveIndicator.tsx with spinner + last activity
Create components/CodeRabbitStatus.tsx for CR review state
Test: Status file created on ralph start
Test: CodeRabbit status shows during cr review
Test: Error banner shows on API error
Test: Hanging warning shows after 60s inactivity
